casebody.data:
Hugh GANT v. Chesley H. LOONEY, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Leavenworth, Kansas. No. 5294. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. March 23, 1956. William W. Morris, Denver, Colo., for appellant. William C. Farmer, U. S. Atty., and Selby S. Soward, Asst. U. S. Atty., Topeka, Kan., for appellee.

Before BRATTON, Chief Judge, and HUXMAN and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed without opinion.
